Name: Byzantine
Ingredients: Top up with Thomas Henry Tonic Water
Instructions: MUDDLE basil in base of shaker. Add other ingredients apart from tonic water, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with tonic water.
Review: This fruity, herbal drink is even better made the way Douglas originally intended, with basil infused gin instead of muddled leaves.
History: Created in 2001 by Douglas Ankrah for Akbar, Soho, London, England.
